thread.title: Kellie Sebastian: Kids Day, Earth Day, Opening Day celebration Saturday at the Franklin County Farmers Market | Spectrum
thread.title_full: Kellie Sebastian: Kids Day, Earth Day, Opening Day celebration Saturday at the Franklin County Farmers Market | Spectrum | state-journal.com

title: Kellie Sebastian: Kids Day, Earth Day, Opening Day celebration Saturday at the Franklin County Farmers Market | Spectrum
text:
The day we’ve been anxiously awaiting is here, and we can’t wait to see everyone bright and early Saturday beginning at 8:30 a.m. at the Franklin County Farmers Market. Last year, we began a new tradition and included another Kids Day in the mix.
Kellie Sebastian
As most of you know they are always the second Saturday of the month except for our second annual Kids Day, Earth Day, Opening Day celebration. And, again this year, we have Solarize Frankfort to thank for their sponsorship that will allow each kid 18 and under to have $2 in tokens to spend on produce and plants.
